casebody.data:
In the Matter of L.L.B., a Juvenile. No. 160P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Anna S. Lucas, for Gleason, Alicea. Theresa M. Sprain, Raleigh, for GAL. David S. Tedder, Assistant County Attorney, for Columbus County DSS. Alicea Gleason, for Gleason, Alicea.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th of May 2015 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
